original_text: The Lord is Israel's Holy God. He is the one who created Israel. He says this about the things that will happen: ‘You should not ask me questions about my children. You should not tell me what to do with the people that I have made The Lord is Israel's Holy God. He is the one who created Israel. He says this about the things that will happen:
korean_text: 이스라엘의 거룩하신 이 곧 이스라엘을 지으신 여호와께서 이같이 이르시되 너희가 장래 일을 내게 물으며 또 내 아들들과 내 손으로 한 일에 관하여 내게 명령하려느냐

sentences.original_text: The Lord is Israel's Holy God.
He is the one who created Israel.
He says this about the things that will happen:
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 일어날 일들에 대해 이렇게 말씀하십니다:

sentences.original_text: You should not ask me questions about my children.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나의 자녀들에 대해 내게 질문해서는 안 된다.

sentences.original_text: You should not tell me what to do
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 내게 무엇을 해야 할지 말해서는 안 된다.

sentences.original_text: with the people that I have made.
